metadata.Title: CVE-2013-0347 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Gentoo init script for webfs uses world-readable permissions for /var/log/webfsd.log, which allows local users to have unspecified impact by reading the file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0347` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

webfs - 1.21+ds1-9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webfs package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.21+ds1-9').
